import React from "react"; import data from "../data/contact.json"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; const Contact = ({isBg}) => { const {contact} = data; return(
{contact.subtitle}

{contact.title}

  • {contact.address} {contact.addressText1}
    {contact.addressText2}
  • {contact.phone} {contact.phone}
  • {contact.email} {contact.emailText}
) } export default Contact;
